description: This file is a JavaScript source file implementing a simple API client for the Stock Growth Analyzer frontend. It provides functions to resolve the API base URL, build request URLs, handle API responses, and two exported functions: analyzeGrowth to call the backend API for stock growth analysis, and getApiBaseUrl to retrieve the API base URL.

methods.name: resolveBaseUrl()
methods.description: Determines the base URL for API calls by checking environment variables, window location, or falling back to localhost.

methods.name: buildUrl(path)
methods.description: Constructs a full URL string from a given path by appending it to the base URL.

methods.name: handleResponse(res)
methods.description: Processes fetch API responses, parsing JSON if content-type is JSON, or text otherwise, and throws errors if response is not OK.

methods.name: analyzeGrowth(payload)
methods.description: Sends a POST request to the backend analyze-growth endpoint with a payload for stock growth analysis, returning the JSON response.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the resolved API base URL for purposes such as display or debugging.
